testcase.name: Add new customer
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Chrome browser............................................passed When User opens URL "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login"..............passed And User enters Email as "admin@yourstore.com" and Password as "admin"......passed And Click on Login..........................................................passed Then User can view Dashboard................................................passed When User click on customer menu............................................passed And Click on customers menu item............................................passed And Click on add new button.................................................passed Then User can view add new customer page....................................passed When User enter customer info...............................................passed And Click on save button....................................................passed Then User can view confirmation message "The new customer has been added successfully.".passed And Close browser...........................................................passed
